item.title: Strange Times | #savestanfordmvb
item.description: Welcome! First of all, thanks for stopping by. My hope is to post here on a somewhat regular basis, but I can’t make any promises. I guess you’ll just have to keep checking back for updates. Second, I hope you’re doing alright in these strange, coronavirus times. I decided to start this blog for a number of reasons, the most personal of which is to start a journey to the “Kinda Good Island” (in the words of Learner Lab founder Trevor Ragan) of writing/blogging/putting ideas out in the open.
